Articles.Content:
Ok, so here's the thingy in question:

On the left is part of my Mun base (just a cupola and hitchhiker on legs with a couple of solar panels) on the right is a fuel trailer (fueltank, 2 probe cores, wheels).

What i'm attempting to do is pass this widget (block of batteries and RTGs and a mechjeb) from the trailer to the base.

The pair of ports on the left will undock, leaving the widget with the trailer, but the pair on the right will not so I can't attach it to the base, when I click the button nothing happens.

The trailer had the widget passed to it in orbit so I know it's possible to pass the widget from one thing to another, also, I tried undocking the widget from the trailer so it just drops on the floor and that worked ok. I also tried it on a different building in the base and had the same problem.

Anyone have any ideas what the problem might be?
Can't Undock Bug, How To Fix
Yay, just tried it and it worked thanks.
